metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

extracted_sections.section_title: If you want to use an image as your signature or initials:
There are three options to progress from the post-sending page:
following depending upon your operating system:

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Fill and Sign PDF Forms You can easily fill, sign, and share your documents using Acrobat s Fill   Sign tool. Types of PDF forms Types of PDF forms Interactive forms : These contain fields that you can select and fill in. Flat forms : These do not have interactive fields.
The forms preferences apply to the way that the application handles open forms as you work. The preferences aren t saved with the PDF forms themselves. Enable the Auto-Complete option 1.
Sign your name in black ink on a clean, blank sheet of white paper. Sign in the middle  of the paper so you don t photograph or scan the edges. Photograph or scan your signature.

To remove all entries, select Remove All . To remove some of the entries, select the entries and click Remove . (Shift-  select to select multiple adjacent entries; Ctrl-select to select multiple nonadjacent entries.) Change flat forms to fillable (Acrobat Pro) You can change a flat form to a fillable form by either using the Prepare Form tool or enabling the Fill   Sign tools.
In Acrobat, select Create from the global bar. The Create a PDF tool opens. On the le ÅŒ rail, select Blank page , and then select Create .
